name: Mushu
description: Short haired, brownish-gray colored rabbit with a charming personality. Friendly with all and loves to munch and crunch on any and everything he finds. Needs an energetic owner.

name: Simba
description: Light-brown colored, blue-eyed rabbit with a knack for snacks. Independent personality that likes to lead his humans to do his bidding. Needs a gullible owner.

name: MoonMoon
description: White-colored rabbit with black eyeliner, and black spots. Loves endless cuddles, pats, and kisses. Needs a patient, loving owner.

name: Meeshu
description: Pure white colored rabbit with black eyes. Filled with anxiety and runs away from slight movement. Needs an anxious owner to match.

name: Steven
description: Black-colored rabbit with large ears. Stomps at all times due to a constant need for attention and to assert dominance. Needs an owner that will be able to train him well.

name: SRK
description: Brown-colored rabbit with short black ears. Fun, warm personality at all times. Needs playful owner.
